price: La mbingu wala ardhi hazikuwalilia, wala hawakupewa muhula.
arabic: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ
footnotes: Basi la mbingu wala ardhi hazikuwahuzunukia ilipo wanyakua adhabu, jinsi ilivyo haribika hali yao; wala hawakungojewa watubu, wala hawakupewa muhula wapate kudiriki taksiri yao, kwa jinsi walivyo dharauliwa!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā bakat ʿalayhimu al-samāu wal-arḍu wamā kānū munẓarīna
